TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RectangleHotSpot extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot
Public NotInheritable Class RectangleHotSpot Inherits HotSpot
public ref class RectangleHotSpot sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::HotSpot

summary.span: 在 控件中定义矩形作用点区域。

span.span: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类在控件中定义矩形作用点区域。This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an control. 若要定义对象的区域, 请将属性设置为表示矩形区域左上角的 x 坐标的值。To define the region of the object, set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 将属性设置为表示矩形区域左上角的 y 坐标的值。Set the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner. 将属性设置为表示矩形区域右下角的 x 坐标的值。Set the property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 属性集的值, 它表示矩形区域右下角的 y 坐标。Set of the property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner. 单击控件时, 该页面将导航到 URL, 生成回发到服务器的 post 或不执行任何操作。When a control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing. 属性指定此行为。The property specifies this behavior. 若要导航到 URL, 请将属性设置`HotSpotMode.Navigate`为, 并使用属性指定要导航到的 URL。To navigate to a URL, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the property to specify the URL to navigate to. 若要回发到服务器, 请将属性设置`HotSpotMode.PostBack`为, 并使用属性指定对象的名称。To post back to the server, set the property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the property to specify a name for the object. 当单击时 ,此名称将在事件数据中传递。This name will be passed in the event data when the is clicked. 。. 如果希望对象没有任何行为, 请将属性设置为`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。If you want the object to have no behavior, set the property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个作用点区域时回发到服务器。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 用户每次单击其中一个对象时 , 都会调用方法, 并向用户显示所选作用点的坐标。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/CS/imagemapclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageMapClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageMapClass2/VB/imagemapclass2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建两个对象, 设置其属性, 并将它们添加到控件的集合中。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create two objects, set their properties, and add them to the control's collection. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/CS/rectanglehotspot.cstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Cstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Cstr/VB/rectanglehotspot.cstrvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 对象定义。

span.span: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.

value.span: 矩形区域底边的 y 坐标，该矩形区域由此 对象定义。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您获取或设置一个值, 该值表示此对象所定义的矩形区域底边的 y 坐标。 The property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this object. 若要完全定义对象, 必须为此属性指定一个值, 并为、 和属性指定一个值。To completely define a object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 以声明方式创建一个对象, 并以声明方式设置其属性, 包括属性。One object is created declaratively and its properties, including the property, are set declaratively. 其他对象是以编程方式创建的, 它的属性 (包括属性) 以编程方式进行设置。The other object is created programmatically and its properties, including the property, are set programmatically. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/CS/rectanglehotspot.topcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.Top#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.Top/VB/rectanglehotspot.topvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overrides Function GetCoordinates () As String

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串表示 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

span.span: Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

returns.span: 一个字符串，表示 对象左上角和右下角的 x 坐标和 y 坐标。

span.span: A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串, 该字符串表示对象左上角和右下角的坐标。This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner. 此方法使用分配给和属性的值返回左上角的坐标。This method uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner. 它使用分配给和属性的值来返回右下角的坐标。It uses the values assigned to the and properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner. 方法由 ASP.NET 在内部使用, 用于在呈现时获取用于的坐标的文本。 The method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a when it is rendered. 返回的字符串特定于浏览器和标记语言。The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建包含两个对象的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create an control that contains two objects. 属性设置为`HotSpotMode.PostBack`, 这会使页面在用户每次单击其中一个作用点区域时回发到服务器。 The property is set to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, which causes the page to post back to the server each time a user clicks one of the hot spot regions. 用户每次单击其中一个对象时 , 都会调用方法, 并向用户显示所选作用点的坐标。Each time the user clicks one of the objects, the method is called and the coordinates of the selected hot spot are displayed to the user. 若要使此示例正常工作, 必须为属性提供自己的图像, 并适当地更新图像的路径, 以便应用程序可以找到它。For this example to work correctly, you must supply your own image for the property and update the path to the image appropriately so that the application can locate it. [!code-aspx-csharp[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/CS/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates/VB/rectanglehotspot.getcoordinatesvb.aspx#1)]
